data.title: Secrets and Lies PT 2
data.meta_description: Secrets and Lies Pt 2 - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. Jared reads a letter revealing that he is Sarah's biological father. He confronts Gwen about this, accusing her of using Sarah to trap Ethan into marriage. In an emotional moment, Jared kisses Gwen, which is witnessed by Rebecca. Theresa sees the kiss and attacks Jared, but Ethan stops her and tells Theresa and Gwen that he is done playing the devoted husband to a woman with secrets.
